programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: singer Miyakawa Airi, who's popular for her natural charm; and Atarayo, a three-piece band whose young fans love their emotional lyrics, vocals, and sound.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-19.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at scissors. After arriving in Japan, they evolved in unique ways.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: On a historical street in Kawagoe, join a kitty for breakfast in front of a ramen restaurant. Also see hospitable kitties hard at work greeting tourists at local shops!

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: The prefecture of Nagasaki, historically Japan's gateway to the west, has a culture influenced by centuries of foreign trade. With over 1,400 islands, it also makes for a unique cycling experience.

programme.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
programme.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Passy, an exclusive residential area in Paris, is home to a number of famous people. Known for its landmarks and museums, we visit Maison de Balzac, a piano restorer's workshop, and Bois de Boulogne.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Oze National Park contains the largest mountain wetland in Japan. See the beauty of Oze as time-lapse photography makes the flowers and the morning dew come alive.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Akan-Mashu
programme.desc: Akan-Mashu National Park is home to Lake Akan, Lake Kussharo, and Lake Mashu. It provides unique winter sights and the opportunity to experience the indigenous Ainu culture.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Ekiben Japan
programme.desc: The Volcano Bento uses only local ingredients, grown in the Shimabara Peninsula's soil shaped by Mt. Unzen's eruptions. It's a heartfelt bento from locals who know the volcano's dangers and gifts.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: The Maki-e lacquering technique uses gold dust on a jet-black background to dazzling effect.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: checking that others have understood instructions. Shang Yan, from China, works as a train cleaner in Tokyo. To improve her skills as a team leader, she tackles a roleplay challenge.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Japanese chef Kai Kosei's dishes feature "zako," fish either too small or not commonly eaten that are often discarded, causing a reevaluation of these once "useless" fish.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Kamikaze: An Untold History Part2
programme.desc: "Kamikaze," explosive-laden ramming attacks, were carried out during World War 2, sacrificing 4,000 lives. Why did the Japanese push forward with this method? We uncover the truth about the kamikaze.

programme.title: Amami: Biodiversity
programme.desc: Amami Oshima is a World Natural Heritage Site, with rare flora and fauna including many endemic species. Explore the biodiversity of its lush, subtropical forests in stunning time-lapse footage.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hiroshima'S A-Bomb Survivor Trees
programme.desc: Trees that survived the A-bomb have inspired many in Hiroshima. 159 such trees are still alive, but some are nearing their end. We follow a tree surgeon and others who love and care for them.

programme.title: Under the power S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Lu Yi, a cold and elite officer of the Ming Dynastys secret police, the Jinyiwei, crosses paths with Yuan Jin Xia, a sharp and tomboyish officer from the Police's 6th Division. Initially clashing over cases, theyre forced to work together when assigned to investigate missing river repair funds. As they unravel a conspiracy involving high-ranking officials, their mutual animosity gradually transforms into friendship and love.

programme.title: Infinity and Beyond S1 Ep23
programme.desc: In 2022, to celebrate the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong's return to China, Mango TV and TVB decided to produce a music program. There are 16 singers from either Hong Kong or China who love Hong Kong's music/cantopop. The 16 singers are separated into two teams: men and women team.

programme.title: Fall In Love Again S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Lawyer Mu Qian and mediator Ou Yang decide to divorce due to a lack of trust and understanding, but are given a 30-day cooling-off period. As they continue to cross paths at work and handle other couples' divorce cases, they begin to reflect on their own relationship and mistakes. With time running out, they must decide whether they can resolve their issues and rekindle their love.

As they continue to cross paths at work and handle other couples' divorce cases, they begin to reflect on their own relationship and mistakes. With time running out, they must decide whether they can resolve their issues and rekindle their love.

programme.title: Fall In Love Again S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Lawyer Mu Qian and mediator Ou Yang decide to divorce due to a lack of trust and understanding, but are given a 30-day cooling-off period. As they continue to cross paths at work and handle other couples' divorce cases, they begin to reflect on their own relationship and mistakes. With time running out, they must decide whether they can resolve their issues and rekindle their love.

programme.title: Under the power S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Lu Yi, a cold and elite officer of the Ming Dynastys secret police, the Jinyiwei, crosses paths with Yuan Jin Xia, a sharp and tomboyish officer from the Police's 6th Division. Initially clashing over cases, theyre forced to work together when assigned to investigate missing river repair funds. As they unravel a conspiracy involving high-ranking officials, their mutual animosity gradually transforms into friendship and love.

programme.title: Sherlock S1 Ep30
programme.desc: It is the first female-centric "puzzle-solving" show. The show explores workplace issues faced by women. The show features a legal education segment with a lawyer expert at the end of each episode.

programme.title: Infinity and Beyond S1 Ep29
programme.desc: In 2022, to celebrate the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong's return to China, Mango TV and TVB decided to produce a music program. There are 16 singers from either Hong Kong or China who love Hong Kong's music/cantopop. The 16 singers are separated into two teams: men and women team.

programme.title: My Matrilocal Husband S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweet and hilarious journey between the patriarch Duan Ruo Rou and the consortium's heir Lu Ao Tian, who accidentally became the "Son-in-Law" in Yunnan's semi-primitive tribe Huacheng.
